message:
I never really got the point behind AI until I read this comment:
"If we made those same moves, Our teachers would slap our wrists. They’d smack me!, You don’t push from behind on the fifth line!"

Not only AI might help a computer to think like humans, but it might even think better. It would have the resources and the time to question human beliefs and conventional wisdom. The stuff we just don't have the time to question.
story: Mohammad Fouad shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Why Google's Go win is such a big deal
caption: theverge.com
description: DeepMind’s dramatic victory over legendary Go player Lee Se-dol earlier today is a huge moment in the history of artificial intelligence, and something many predicted would be decades away. "I was...

data.message:
Lee se-dol won the 4th match though...
If he had won the first 3 matches and lost the four, the news wasn't going to be something big.
but since he had already lost 3 games out of 5, the media talked like if the system is invincible, later, Lee se-dol won the forth proving it is not.
